description:
Pushing a dummy event like a second prom is a great idea on Hachiman’s part, but the tactic isn’t foolproof against Yukino’s mother. Good thing he has an ace up his sleeve…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: En espérant ne plus commettre d`erreur.
Semete, Mou Machigaetakunai to Negai Nagara.
Wishing That, at the Very Least, I Don`t Make Anymore Mistakes.
أتمنى، أنني على الأقل لن أرتكب المزيد من الأخطاء.
せめて, もうまちがえたくないと願いながら.
